title: elegant sans / 'The Salon': Ultra-thin sans with contrast - various suggestions {gang}
content:
Anyone know what this typeface is? Im looking for an elegant sans seri with a high stroke contrast like this one. Any suggestions?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [74.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/files/74.jpg) | 52.44 KB |
author: aliyanura

comments.content:
We have had similar samples before - this seems to be a popular topic. Someone may have a list of 'elegant contrasty sans' faces. I cannot recall the specific font names, but a Google search might locate the threads.

I also recall once suggesting that some samples might have been high contrast serif faces with the serifs removed.

- Mike Yanega

I’ve gone through the previous posts and compiled a list of thin stressed sans typefaces. Additions welcome.

[BP Sang Bleu Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.bpfoundry.com/fonts/cut.htm?font=18&cut=50) by [Ian Party](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/ianparty.com/index.php?id=5)  
 [Eric Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.fountaintype.com/typefaces/eric-sans) by [Peter Bruhn](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Peter%20Bruhn)  
 [Fashion Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com/node/%20%22Fashion%20Thin%22) by [Alex Wiederin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alex%20Wiederin)  
 [COM4t Fine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/com4t-fff.seesaa.net/article/20901050.html) by [Hideki Katayama](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hideki%20Katayama)  
 [Penny Bee](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/revival/penny-bee.html) by Daylight Fonts  
 [Stark Debonair](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/type/s/stark-debonair.html) by [Robert Stark](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Robert%20Stark), digitized as [Retro Super Skinny](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.subflux.com/Fonts/FontsRecre_Idle.htm) by [Mikey Rossi](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mikey%20Rossi)  
 [Fotostar Serendipity](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/fotostar/Serendipity.jpg)  
 [T-26 Intention](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/68-Intention) by [Adam Roe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adam%20Roe)  
 [Noir](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.frodehelland.com/img/work/noir03.png) by [Frode Helland](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.typophile.com/user/17101)  
 [Florida](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/type/f/florida.html) by [Hans Möhring](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hans%20M%C3%B6hring)  
 [Optima Nova Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.linotype.com/54144/optimanovalight-font.html) by [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf)  
 [Young Finesse](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/young-finesse/) by [Doyald Young](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Doyald%20Young)  
 [Beorcana Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.beorcana.com/specs2.html) by [Carl Crossgrove](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Carl%20Crossgrove)  
 [Peignot Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/peignot_light/) by [A.M. Cassandre](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/A.M.%20Cassandre)  
 [Britannic Extra Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/britannic-lt/extra-light/)  
 [Yasashii](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/yasashii/) by [Ryoichi Tsunekawa](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ryoichi%20Tsunekawa)  
 [Trio](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/trio-ct/) by [Jason Castle](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jason%20Castle)  
 [Castle Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/castle/t-light/) by [Steve Jackaman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Steve%20Jackaman)  
 [Radiant Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/radiant/ef-text-light/) by [Robert Hunter Middleton](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Robert%20Hunter%20Middleton)  
 [Ambient](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/ambient.html) by [Gábor Kóthay](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/G%C3%A1bor%20K%C3%B3thay)  
 [Condor](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Condor/styles/) by [David Jonathan Ross](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Jonathan%20Ross)

F

Fantastic job, Florian! :-)  
Two possible additions:  
a little less contrast  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/kurosawa-sans/normal/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/kurosawa-sans/normal/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/kurosawa-sans/normal/")  
a little quirkier  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/smart-frocks-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/smart-frocks-nf/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/smart-frocks-nf/")

[Finura](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/finura/) by [Santos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dino%20dos%20http%3A/%252Fwww.dstype.com/) is related, in a very nice way.
No, but it does have a similar feel to it.

Also, in the meantime Noir has been released as Vinter: [https://monokrom.no/fonts/vinter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100416/https:/monokrom.no/fonts/vinter "https://monokrom.no/fonts/vinter")
